description: This file defines a React component for Animal Selection Page, including UI elements for selecting an animal and navigating to its dashboard. It includes a specific card for the Giant Anteater and placeholders for future animals.

methods.name: ComingSoonCard
methods.description: Reusable component displaying a placeholder card for animals not yet available.

methods.name: AnimalSelectionPage
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the animal selection interface, including navigation logic.
